inclusion.criterion: Undergoing lone mitral valve surgery for chronic primary mitral regurgitation within 30 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Indication for mitral valve surgery is a class I or IIa according to the 2014 ACC/AHA guidelines for the management of valvular heart disease.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have a device which is not compatible with MRI
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant CABG, other valve surgery, or other cardiac surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Atrial fibrillation or other substantial arrhythmia that would substantially degrade MRI image acquisition.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
